summary: This bill, the Freight Rail Assets Investment to Launch Commercial Activity Revitalization Act of 2025 (Freight RAILCAR Act of 2025), proposes a tax credit to encourage the modernization of freight railcars.  It amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10% credit for expenses related to replacing or modernizing inefficient railcars.  The bill defines qualified railcars, modernization requirements, and sets limitations, including a three-year termination date and special rules for basis adjustments and syndication. It also mandates a Treasury report on the credit's impact.
